# Dr. Karthik Manchala Ortho Clinic

## About
Dr. Karthik Manchala is a leading orthopaedic surgeon in Manikonda, Hyderabad with 12+ years of experience. Specialist in joint replacement, arthroscopy, fracture treatment, and sports injury care.

## Location
Clinic Address: Rd Number 25, Alkapur Township, Manikonda, Hyderabad 500089, Telangana, India
Phone: +91 [Contact Number]
Email: [Contact Email]

## Services
- Knee Replacement Surgery (Total & Partial)
- Hip Replacement Surgery  
- Arthroscopic Surgery (Knee, Shoulder, Ankle)
- Fracture Treatment
- Sports Injury Treatment
- ACL/PCL Reconstruction
- Meniscus Repair
- Joint Arthritis Treatment
- Osteoporosis Management
- Pediatric Orthopaedics

Monday - Saturday: 10:00 AM - 2:00 PM, 5:00 PM - 8:00 PM
Sunday: Closed

## Treatment Philosophy
We combine thorough diagnosis, personalized treatment plans, and dedicated post-operative care using minimally invasive surgical techniques for faster recovery and better outcomes.
